column4: I got kind of a fun, easy question. How do I add panels to my desktop? I removed it when I put on AWN, so once I get rid of AWN i'd like to use the original panel that comes with Ubuntu in a fresh install

I got kind of a fun, easy question. How do I add panels to my desktop? I removed it when I put on AWN, so once I get rid of AWN i'd like to use the original panel that comes with Ubuntu in a fresh install?
thanks much!!! And the rest of ya too!
